title: MS Dhoni is Citroen's new brand ambassador: Sources
description: Indian cricket legend Mahendra Singh Dhoni has been appointed as the brand ambassador for French carmaker Citroen in India, as per sources. The move aims to boost brand recognition for the Stellantis Group company in the competitive Indian market. Dhoni is set to represent the brand for two years, with an annual fee of Rs 7 crore, as revealed by the sources.
